EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge: Step Forward onto the right career path
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Whatever you've been up to since NCS we're sure you're feeling motivated about making a difference and gaining new skills. But your journey with The Challenge doesn't have to stop there. If you want to make a positive difference whilst gaining valuable career skills then Step Forward could be for you.
Step Forward is a unique apprenticeship scheme for school leavers where you will get the opportunity to start a career, gain a professional qualification and mix with other young people on social action projects.
There are six different pathways from IT to Early Years Education and we have a brand new pathway for those interested in Hospitality. If you want to move forward into a hospitality career, Step Forward has a brilliant opportunity with global hotel brand, Marriott Hotels, which is open to those aged 17-19.
Key Facts about the Step Forward Apprenticeship scheme:
Get paid a £9000 salary ​​Mix with other young people from different backgrounds Work on personal development and social action projects Fully supported programme with mentors and tutors 12 months long
We still have limited places for September 2016 starts, so get in touch today to find out more!
Call today on 0203 793 7333 or email step.forward@the-challenge.org
www.stepforward.uk.com
